values.title: Mahatma Gandhi
values.desc: Be the change that you wish to see in the world

values.title: Stephen Chbosky
values.desc: Things change And friends leave Life doesnt stop for anybody

values.title: Leo Tolstoy
values.desc: Everyone thinks of changing the world but no one thinks of changing himself

values.title: Margaret Mead
values.desc: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful committed citizens can change the world Indeed it is the only thing that ever has

values.title: John Green The Fault in Our Stars
values.desc: Grief does not change you Hazel It reveals you

values.title: Nelson Mandela
values.desc: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world

values.title: Roy T Bennett
values.desc: Its only after youve stepped outside your comfort zone that you begin to change grow and transform

values.title: Albert Einstein
values.desc: The world as we have created it is a process of our thinking It cannot be changed without changing our thinking

values.title: Rumi
values.desc: Yesterday I was clever so I wanted to change the world Today I am wise so I am changing myself

values.title: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley Frankenstein
values.desc: Nothing is so painful to the human mind as a great and sudden change

values.title: Raymond Chandler
values.desc: To say goodbye is to die a little

values.title: Friedrich Nietzsche
values.desc: The snake which cannot cast its skin has to die As well the minds which are prevented from changing their opinions they cease to be mind

values.title: Lemony Snicket
values.desc: Love can change a person the way a parent can change a baby awkwardly and often with a great deal of mess

values.title: Roy T Bennett
values.desc: You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone change begins at the end of your comfort zone

values.title: Andy Warhol
values.desc: They always say time changes things but you actually have to change them yourself

values.title: Steve Maraboli
values.desc: Incredible change happens in your life when you decide to take control of what you do have power over instead of craving control over what you dont
